landing.welcome.title: Welcome to cashew!
landing.welcome.description1: We are the official buy now pay later partner of du, and we are here to help you make your dream phone a reality.
landing.welcome.description2:
Depending on your eligibility, you can divide the price of your brand-new smartphone into up to 24 manageable monthly 
payments at zero cost.
landing.welcome.description3: Go to the next page to see how to qualify for our interest-free payment plans.
landing.verification.description1:
We’ll do things simple and quick. 
Please have the following ready, and we’ll take care of the rest.
landing.verification.description5: Your debit or credit card issued in the UAE with an expiration date longer than your selected payment plan.
landing.download.description1: Did you know you can easily and quickly apply for cashew services through our mobile app? It's a simpler and faster way to get things done.
landing.download.description2: Get the cashew app today and check out what's new!
